Title: Provides for minimum registered nurse staffing for intensive care and critical care patients
Summary: Requires a minimum registered nurse staffing ratio of one nurse for every two intensive care or critical care patients.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-aa, amd ยง2805-t, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing for minimum registered nurse staffing for intensive care and critical care patients
